programme.desc: As Anna travels back to Barcelona, reuniting with Erica to celebrate her engagement to Nico, she meets a charming farmer and accidentally finds herself engaged to save his family's legacy.

programme.desc: Detectives Cora and Liam must solve a murder, all while Liam pushes Cora toward Finn Walsh, her fated match, in order to change their destinies.

programme.desc: An aspiring jewelry designer returns to Belgium to visit her grandfather and hopefully win the Valentine's Day Diamond Contest.

programme.desc: Taking a break from her wellness empire, an entrepreneur develops a budding romance with a handsome man at a relaxing retreat.

programme.title: The Chicken Sisters
programme.desc: With their two restaurants finally united as THE CHICKEN SISTERS, Gus, Nancy, Amanda, and Mae are thriving...until Ultimate Kitchen Clash premieres. Stars Schuyler Fisk, Genevieve Angelson, Lea Thompson, and Wendie Malick.
